mapper.insert: insert into item(shopidx, itemname, itemnotice, cost, salecost, quantity, image, category, starttime, endtime) values(#{shopidx},#{itemname}, #{itemnotice}, #{cost},#{salecost},#{quantity},#{image},#{category}, #{starttime}, #{endtime});
mapper.select: select * from item where shopidx = #{shopidx} and itemname = #{itemname};
